name: gskcloudbot
0:
”Alexa, open connect g. s. k. cloud bot”
”Alexa, launch connect g. s. k. cloud bot”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connect g. s. k. cloud bot
des:
Provision Cloud resources via automation . The application invokes an Azure bot which greets the end users and takes over further control of workflow. The bot has been integrated with Power flows to invoke deployment pipelines.
In the initial version, the deployment picks up sample code from git and deploys in GCP test project. This will be further updated in subsequent releases and enhanced functionality will be made available across Azure and GCP cloud environments for service fulfillment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
